lead_paragraph: Clemson defensive end Shaq Lawson remains sore but hopes to play against Alabama in the national championship game Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Clemson's Lawson Hopes He Can Play Despite Sore Knee
headline.main: Clemson's Lawson Hopes He Can Play Despite Sore Knee
